channel.title: English on Hello Alili
channel.description: Recent content in English on Hello Alili

item.title: Long Time No See
item.description: Hello everyone, It’s been almost three years since I last updated my blog. So much has changed since then. I want to share some of my recent experiences with you. First, my whole family and I have moved to a new country. It was a big change for us. We are still getting used to everything. In my job, I’ve noticed that front-end technology is not as demanding as I thought it would be.
